criteria: Recognition of Memorized Words and Phrases
descriptions: Shows no understanding of the general meaning of familiar topics.
Struggles to grasp the general meaning, with minimal comprehension.
Demonstrates partial understanding of the general meaning in very familiar topics.
Understands the general meaning of familiar common daily topics with some clarity.
Clearly understands the general meaning of most familiar common daily topics.
Demonstrates thorough and nuanced understanding of the general meaning across a wide range of familiar common daily topics.
Unable to recognize any memorized words or phrases.
Recognizes very few memorized words or phrases.
Recognizes some memorized words and phrases with difficulty.
Recognizes memorized words, phrases, and simple sentences in structured contexts.
Recognizes most memorized words, phrases, and simple sentences in authentic texts.
Quickly and accurately recognizes a wide range of memorized words, phrases, and simple sentences even in complex authentic texts.
Does not comprehend any basic information on familiar topics.
Struggles to comprehend basic information, demonstrating very limited understanding.
Comprehends a minimal amount of basic information with significant effort.
Demonstrates comprehension of some basic information on very familiar common daily topics.
Demonstrates good comprehension of basic information on familiar common daily topics.
Demonstrates excellent comprehension of basic information, including subtle details, across a variety of familiar common daily topics.
